news.topic: Elephants seen flying over Bangkok
news.shortDetail: Brief summary about elephants seen flying over bangkok.
news.fullDetail:
Reports have emerged about elephants seen flying over bangkok, drawing widespread attention and debate. Eyewitnesses describe unusual details and stories that quickly spread across local and international media.

Social media platforms were flooded with posts, videos, and photos, many of which went viral within hours. Some users expressed excitement and curiosity, while others raised doubts about the authenticity of the claims.

Experts and officials have weighed in, offering explanations ranging from scientific reasoning to cultural interpretations. While some insist the phenomenon could be plausible, skeptics argue there is little to no solid evidence.
